title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Â      View of Earth Lodge from the Visitor Center NPS Photo  While visiting the park, you will see our earth lodge with it's original floor that was carbon dated to 1015. We also have a visitor center that houses our museum with over 2000 artifacts and a 17 minute orientation film. We have 7 mounds as well as over 6 miles of hiking trails. We have a cell phone tour at 7 sites throughout the park. Dial (478) 257-9250. It's free however you will use your cell phone service and minutes.
